title: Reader, here you'l plainly see iudgement perverted by these three, a priest, a judge, a patentee written by Thomas Heywood.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
notes: Illustration (wood-cut) on t.p., representing the three characters (i.e. Archbishop Laud, Lord keeper Finch, and Alderman Abell).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
